#Text=Álvaro I of Kongo
#Text=The coat of arms issued to King Álvaro I in 1578
#Text=Álvaro I Nimi a Lukeni lua Mvemba was a Manikongo ( Mwene Kongo ) , or king of Kongo , from 1568 to 1587 .
#Text=Biography
#Text=Álvaro 's father was an unknown Kongo nobleman who died , leaving his mother to remarry to King Henrique I .
#Text=When Henrique I died fighting on the eastern frontier , he had left Álvaro as his regent .
#Text=According to Duarte Lopes , Kongo 's ambassador to Rome in 1584-88 , Álvaro had taken up the kingship by common consent .
#Text=However , there do appear to have been others who wished to be king , and some scholars , notably Francois Bontinck , think that Álvaro 's rule was seen as an usurpation .
#Text=The invasion of the Jagas , which took place shortly after Álvaro became king , is sometimes seen as a protest against this usurpation .
#Text=Other scholars , however doubt the connection between the Jaga invasion and a dynastic crisis .
#Text=The Jagas , however , did create a major problem for Álvaro , who had to abandon the capital of Mbanza Kongo , and flee to an island in the Congo River .
#Text=From that place he sought help from Portugal to restore him to the throne and expel the Jagas .
#Text=Portugal responded by sending an expedition of 600 soldiers , mostly from the colony of São Tome , under the command of Francisco de Gouveia Sottomaior .
#Text=Gouveia Sottomaior 's instructions included obtaining some sort of vassalage from Álvaro and regaining control of the Portuguese community in Kongo by building a fort to " protect " them .
#Text=However that might be , strong opposition by Portuguese in Kongo , led by Álvaro 's confessor , Francisco Barbuda , prevented most of Gouveia Sottomaior 's instructions from being carried out .
#Text=However , Álvaro apparently did permit the Portuguese to settle in Luanda and the colony of Angola was born when Paulo Dias de Novais arrived with his force in 1575 .
#Text=Álvaro sought to relieve the potential threat to his sovereignty by assisting Dias de Novais , sending troops to help him in 1577 .
#Text=However , he , or at the very least Francisco Barbuda , was instrumental in persuading the king of Ndongo , where Dias de Novais had his principal forces , to drive the Portuguese out .
#Text=Once this had happened , however , Álvaro sent an army to Angola to assist the Portuguese and to conquer Ndongo .
#Text=The conquest failed , however , as the Kongo army was overextended and could not cross the Bengo River successfully .
#Text=Álvaro sought to Europeanize Kongo more fully than had been the case before .
#Text=He was the first king to refer to the capital city as São Salvador .
#Text=He also sought to obtain a bishop from Rome , though it was not until the reign of his son Álvaro II of Kongo that this was accomplished .
#Text=In 1587 , he was succeeded by his son Álvaro II .
